hero.subtitle: Top students from Sweden's best universities. Better tutors, fair compensation, lower prices.

howItWorks.label: How it works
howItWorks.title: Three simple steps
howItWorks.step1Desc: Subject, level, and goals, we listen and understand.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Handpicked top student with the right experience.
howItWorks.step4Desc: After each lesson you receive a short update on what was covered, progress made, and what comes next.

whyMeritia.label: Why Meritia
whyMeritia.title: A better model
whyMeritia.body1: Great tutoring is not just about knowledge, it is about being understood. We match each student with a tutor who fits their pace, goals and way of thinking.
whyMeritia.body2: Instead of generic solutions, we focus on continuity and direction. Each session builds on the previous one to create clear and steady progress.
whyMeritia.body3: The result is calmer studying, stronger confidence and a plan that actually lasts.
whyMeritia.adv1Desc: Only top students from leading universities. Carefully selected and trained.
whyMeritia.adv2Desc: Minimal margins. You pay for teaching quality, not middlemen.
whyMeritia.adv3Desc: We pay tutors up to 40% more than traditional agencies. This attracts the best.

testimonials.label: Reviews
testimonials.title: What others say
testimonials.t1Text: My daughter went from a C to an A in mathematics in just one semester. The tutors from KTH are fantastic.
testimonials.t2Text: Finally a service that treats tutors with respect. Flexible, well-paid, and professional.
testimonials.t3Text: The quality is in a completely different league. Our son loves his lessons.

cta.title: Ready to raise the bar?
cta.subtitle: Book a free consultation and see how Meritia can help your child reach their academic goals.

forParents.label: For Parents
forParents.subtitle: Meritia connects your child with top students from KTH, Karolinska Institutet, and the Stockholm School of Economics. Better quality, lower price, without compromises.
forParents.b1Desc: Not satisfied? We'll rematch you for free or give you your money back.
forParents.b2Desc: We find the right tutor based on subject, level, personality, and learning style.
forParents.b3Desc: Our model means more money goes to the tutor, and you pay less.
forParents.b4Desc: Mathematics, physics, chemistry, English, Swedish, programming and more.
forParents.pricingTitle: More to the tutor, less to middlemen
forParents.pricingDesc: Traditional companies take 40-60% of what you pay. At Meritia, the majority goes directly to your tutor, meaning more motivation, better quality, and a lower price for you.
forParents.pricingMeritia: goes to the tutor at Meritia
forParents.ctaSubtitle: Tell us what you need, and we'll find the perfect tutor.

becomeTutor.label: Become a Tutor
becomeTutor.subtitle: Do you study at KTH, Karolinska Institutet, or the Stockholm School of Economics? Apply today and join Stockholm's most exclusive tutor team.
becomeTutor.whyTitle: The perks of being a Meritia tutor
becomeTutor.p1Desc: We pay up to 40% more than other platforms.
becomeTutor.p2Desc: You set the schedule, we adapt to you.
becomeTutor.p3Desc: Join a network of top students from KTH, KI, and SSE.
becomeTutor.applyTitle: Submit your application to the waiting list
becomeTutor.thankYou: Thank you for your application! We'll get back to you soon.
becomeTutor.whyBody1: We built Meritia to make tutoring feel more serious, for students, parents, and for you as a tutor. Clear expectations, solid structure, and respect for your time.
becomeTutor.whyBody2: You keep the flexibility, but you are not left alone: we support matching, goals, and continuity so each student has a realistic plan forward.
becomeTutor.whyBody3: When the quality is high, the work becomes more rewarding. Better students, better sessions, better outcomes, and compensation that reflects it.
becomeTutor.cvHelp: Attach your CV in PDF format
becomeTutor.homeKicker: For those who want to teach

contact.label: Contact
contact.subtitle: Book a free consultation or ask a question. We respond within 24 hours.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.consultationDesc: Free 15-minute consultation where we discuss your child's needs and find the right tutor.
contact.thankYou: Thank you! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

about.label: About Meritia
about.subtitle: Meritia was founded in Stockholm with a simple idea: if tutors are paid better, teaching gets better. And if middlemen are minimized, parents pay less.
about.storyP1: As students at KTH and SSE, we saw how existing tutoring companies operated: they took enormous margins, paid tutors poorly, and delivered mediocre quality.
about.storyP2: Meritia was born from the conviction that there is a better way. By hiring exclusively from KTH, Karolinska Institutet, and the Stockholm School of Economics, we ensure academic excellence. By minimizing our margin, we give tutors industry-leading compensation, and parents a better price.
about.storyP3: Today, Meritia is Stockholm's most exclusive private tutoring service, built on the principle that quality should never be compromised.
about.v1Desc: Only the best students from Sweden's most prestigious universities.
about.v2Desc: We were founded to give tutors what they deserve, up to 40% more.
about.v3Desc: Fewer tutors, higher quality. Our selection process is intentionally strict.
about.ctaSubtitle: We'd be happy to tell you more about how Meritia works.
about.valuesQuote: We are not building a marketplace. We are building a standard.

subjects.heroSubtitle: All our tutors are top students from KTH, Karolinska Institutet, and the Stockholm School of Economics. Here are the subjects we offer.

math.title: Mathematics
math.tagline: From basic algebra to advanced analysis
math.description: Mathematics is our most requested subject. Our tutors from KTH and SSE help students at all levels, from middle school to the most demanding high school courses. We focus on deep understanding rather than mechanical calculation.
levels: University mathematics (Single & multivariable calculus, Linear algebra and more)

physics.title: Physics, Chemistry & Biology
physics.description: Our tutors from KTH and Karolinska Institutet give students a solid foundation in natural sciences. We connect theory to reality and make abstract concepts comprehensible through practical examples and structured problem solving.

languages.title: Swedish & English
languages.description: Language is the foundation of all academic success. Our tutors help with everything from grammar and essay writing to text analysis and oral presentations. We adapt teaching to the student's goals, national exams, grades, or preparation for higher education.

programming.title: Programming
programming.tagline: The skill of the future, taught by the best
programming.description: Our tutors from KTH are among Sweden's most skilled young programmers. Whether the student wants to pass their high school course, build their own projects, or prepare for technical university studies, we have the right tutor.

socialStudies.title: Social Studies
socialStudies.description: Our tutors help students understand complex social issues, historical events, and geographical contexts. We focus on analytical thinking, source criticism, and the ability to build well-founded arguments, skills that are crucial for high grades.

modernLanguages.title: Modern Languages
modernLanguages.description: Our language tutors are fluent speakers with academic backgrounds who help students develop both oral and written skills. Whether it's passing national exams or reaching an advanced level, we match the right tutor for the right language.

footer.description: Stockholm's most exclusive private tutoring. Founded to give tutors fair compensation and parents better quality.
